meanings.definition: A person who makes detailed plans or drawings.
meanings.sent1: The draughtsmen carefully sketched out the blueprint for the new building.
meanings.sent2: The team of draughtsmen worked together to create the intricate design for the machine.
meanings.sent3: The draughtsmen joked that their drawings were so detailed, they could almost come to life.
meanings.sent4: The draughtsmen's pens danced across the paper, bringing the plans to life.
meanings.sent5: The draughtsmen's precision in their drawings was unmatched in the industry.

meanings.definition: A group of people who specialize in creating technical drawings or plans.
meanings.sent1: The skilled draughtsmen collaborated on the architectural project, each contributing their expertise.
meanings.sent2: The company hired a team of draughtsmen to work on the blueprints for the new product.
meanings.sent3: The draughtsmen's office was filled with the sound of pencils scratching on paper.
meanings.sent4: The draughtsmen were the architects of the detailed plans that brought the project to life.
meanings.sent5: The draughtsmen's attention to detail ensured the accuracy of the technical drawings.
